text: The Buick Verano is a compact car made by SAIC-GM for the GM's Buick brand. It was launched at the North American International Auto Show on January 10, 2011, It was shown during a preview of Buick's then upcoming 2012 model. It has been made from 2010 to the present day. __TOC__ == Sales == Calendar year Sales (United States) Sales (China; known as the Excelle GT * from 2010 to 2015, Verano from 2015 onwards) 2010 81,652 2011 ** 265 134,800 2012 41,042 173,312 2013 45,527 204,274 2014 43,743 246,305 2015 31,886 339,549 *** 2016 30,277 177,202 2017 4,277 185,326 2018 192,174 2019 74,183 Total 197,017 1,808,777 Total combined 2,005,794 * Excelle GT sales include Excelle XT (hatchback) figures. ** Sales in the US began in November 2011. *** 2015 Chinese sales include Excelle XT/GT, 2nd gen. Excelle GT and Verano figures. == References == ==Other websites== * Verano Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Buick Verano
